content:
The existing content that we have about substantive change is here: http://hl7.org/fhir/versions.html#f-compat and https://wiki.hl7.org/FHIR_Guide_to_Designing_Resources#Versioning

Since FHIR has so many usage modes, this is proving particularly difficult to pin down, and we are getting more and more challenges to these policies. We need both an ongoing process and a review of the documented policies
task GF#13370 relates to this subject as well
